colorBoard.title: ColorBoard
colorBoard.description: Web app that turns pictures of handwrritten code into text and compiles it.

html.text: An idea emerged back in the 20th century about a brand new mode of transport involving a magnetic pad to reduce friction. In 2012, when California was all about the California High-Speed Rail project, Elon Musk suggested Hyperloop. We want to show few cases for Hyperloop, which we made in the begining of 2018. So this interface is totally unique, with its own functionality and usability.
